name: Carl Escape
description:
Minigames in a visual novel about a normal day in your life except for the unusual interest your coworker Carl has taken in you. Play as the main character and make choices that will guide your life, with or without Carl, I guess that's up to you.

Made mainly with Pixi.js and a bunch of other node libraries.
